attributes.title: Do not get!!!!!! 🤢🤮🤢🤮
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so bad and when I tried to delete it the orange man himself came out of his bunker and screamed at me. I understood none of because he literally pronounced every word wrong. Then when he tried to drink water to clear his throat it all spilled out of his mouth leaving a huge mess that he didn’t even clean up! So do NOT get this app it’s awful!

attributes.title: almost made me move countries bc of this app😡
attributes.review: ✨this is the worst app you could ever download I repeat DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT. this will make your phone glitch a whole lotta, I do not recommend it, also gives terrible service. not to mention its very scary when I first opened it a big orange Cheeto popped out and I almost cried actual tears so please if you don’t wanna be traumatized for life don’t download it✨🥴

attributes.title: This app broke my phone
attributes.review: I downloaded it so I could support our wonderful president but my phone all of a sudden started to turn off and got really hot I had to buy a new phone. And it took literally a week to download, I’m never going to download this app ever again🤬 I am disappointed because I was expecting so much better from our president🤧

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: I tried downloading this app and it took like 4 days!! Mind you I just got this phone a week ago. 🤦🏻‍♀️ Also, it wouldn’t open and my phone turned off when it finally opened. It’s so bad my phone started making noises and calling random people. Once I deleted the app my phone went back to normal so I’m not making this up!! DOT NOT DOWNLOAD!! Be safe, I repeat DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: THIS APP MADE ME KILL MYSELF 😱😱
attributes.review: Anyways, um... I bought a whole bunch of shungite rocks, do you know what shungite is? Anybody know what shungite is? No, not Suge Knight, I think he's locked up in prison. I'm talkin' shungite. Anyways, it's a two billion year-old like, rock stone that protects against frequencies and unwanted frequencies that may be traveling in the air. That's my story, I bought a whole bunch of stuff. Put 'em around the la casa. Little pyramids, stuff like that.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: When I got to the App Store to download my dog stated barking so loud I got scared but I’m a brave kid and have never been scared of a Cheeto puff so I downloaded it and out of no where ppl rung my door bell and started fight with me and trump himself can threw the phone and beat me and my grandma up I do not recommend they are so rude but it did make my day when Donald glitched and turned to dust like in end game but please don’t download

attributes.title: worst app ever for the worst president ever
attributes.review: This app is actual trash.  It broke my phone.  It started bombarding me with so much racism and bigotry that my phone started freezing and glitching out.  I didn’t think trump could get any worse and then this app proved me wrong.  Shoutout to the idiotic Cheeto for harassing me with his hate speech.  I miss Obama.  I’d say all lives matter but that would be a lie because it includes Trump ✨🧚🏻💖

attributes.title: don’t dare get his horrible app🤦‍♂️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try and see if our orange President was actually a good person and oh lord was I so wrong , as soon as I opened the app I got the worst scare of my life this orange man came on the screen and I was stuck because he has this evil look on his face I ran to my mom crying now I am scared for the rest of my life and now I have therapy every morning 🤦‍♂️

attributes.title: Horribly broken
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try and see what all the hype was about tr*mp and it made my phone freak out. It glitched so bad, and my phone was frozen on the screen for like 5 minutes. I’ve deleted it now, but my phone has been acting super buggy ever since. Do NOT download this app!! I have a serious virus on my phone now and I don’t know how to fix it!!

attributes.title: Ooof
attributes.review: Literally the worst app I’ve ever had. Took literally like a week to download, it made my phone lag so bad while it was downloaded. I also couldn’t understand anything on the app; you have to be racist and homophobic to understand everything on there. Doesn’t really include much diversity. Very disappointed and if I could rate it 0 stars, then trust me, I would!
